Class Lives

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.TextDisplay
      • demolition.Lives

  • public class Lives
extends TextDisplay

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class demolition.TextDisplay

        charSet, colourOne, colourThree, colourTwo, font, size, x, y

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Lives(int x, int y)
      Creates a new lives object at the start of the game which extends from all of the attributes and methods from the TextDisplay super class, including text(), createFont(), textFont(), textSize(), getX() and getY().

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getNumberLives()
      Returns the number of lives which the player has remaining
      void loseLife()
      Decreases the number of lives the player has by 1
      void resetLives()
      Resets the number of lives of the player back to 3

      Creates the text in the App.java to be displayed on the screen Abstract method inherited from the TextDisplay class

      • Lives

        public Lives(int x,
             int y)
        Creates a new lives object at the start of the game which extends from all of the attributes and methods from the TextDisplay super class, including text(), createFont(), textFont(), textSize(), getX() and getY().

        y - the y-coordinate of the lives object
